org.forgerock.openam.rest.fluent

Class PoliciesAuditFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.rest.fluent.AuditFilter
      • org.forgerock.openam.rest.fluent.PoliciesAuditFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.forgerock.json.resource.Filter

    public class PoliciesAuditFilter
extends AuditFilter
    Filter which will audit any policy requests that pass through it. Acts exactly as the AuditFilter and exists solely to provide an implementation of the getActionSuccessDetail(ActionRequest, ActionResponse)} method.
    Since:
    13.0.0

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PoliciesAuditFilter(Debug debug, CrestAuditorFactory crestAuditorFactory)
      Guiced constructor.

      org.forgerock.json.JsonValue getActionSuccessDetail(org.forgerock.json.resource.ActionRequest request, org.forgerock.json.resource.ActionResponse response)
      Provides additional details (e.g. failure description or summary of the payload) relating to an ActionResponse to a successful ActionRequest.

    • Method Detail

      • getActionSuccessDetail

        public org.forgerock.json.JsonValue getActionSuccessDetail(org.forgerock.json.resource.ActionRequest request,
                                                           org.forgerock.json.resource.ActionResponse response)
        Provides additional details (e.g. failure description or summary of the payload) relating to an ActionResponse to a successful ActionRequest. This information is logged in the access audit log. Subclasses can implement this method if they need to return details.
        Overrides:
        getActionSuccessDetail in class AuditFilter
        Parameters:
        request - The ActionRequest instance from which details may be taken. Cannot be null.
        response - The ActionResponse instance from which details may be taken. Cannot be null.
        Returns:
        JsonValue free-form details, or null to indicate no details. The default for no overridden implementation is provided here as null.
